text: Today on the West Coast, it's a bit rough with 5 ft @14s WNW swell and fresh 23 mph SSW wind making it blown out. Tomorrow sees an increase to 9 ft @14s WNW, but the fresh 27 mph SSW wind will keep it messy. Day after drops back to 5 ft @10s WNW, still with 20 mph SSW wind, so expect similar conditions. Best: day after.
